name: Mindshard
description: The Mindshard is a small, malevolent aberration characterized by its cunning abilities and colorful, psychedelic patterns. It has a translucent appearance that enhances its evasion tactics and wields psychic powers.
memorable: It can create cultist minions from fallen foes and has strong charm-related abilities, imposing psychic damage on charmed creatures.
goals: To manipulate and incapacitate foes while creating chaos through its psychic powers and cultist minions.
relations: Often encountered with charmed creatures, it may also be found with newly formed cultists from its Refract Mind ability.
environment: Thrives in environments where it can manipulate and charm its foes.
strengths: Immunity to poison and conditions such as charmed and frightened, alongside effective charm and psychic damage abilities.
weaknesses: Very low Strength makes it vulnerable to physical attacks and a lack of melee mobility can be exploited.
attacks: Uses Refracted Light Beam for radiant damage and can charm foes with psychic damage in its vicinity.
most_powerful_ability: Light Construction creates an area of charm and psychic damage affecting multiple targets.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense creatures without sight.
skills: Possesses a +2 bonus in Perception, making it decent at detecting nearby threats.
additional_information: Can pull humanoids into its body to create cultists.
Imposes psychic damage on charmed creatures nearby.
Invisibility to creatures more than 60 feet away enhances evasion.
Has the ability to charm attackers that hit it.
Utilizes telepathy to command created cultist minions.
test_queries: creature with charm and psychic powers
manipulative enemy that uses psychic damage
